name: Ninja Protocol
description: Ninja Protocol is an ecosystem of products being developed on the Solana blockchain with a focus on gaming and NFTs. Current products in the works are Ninja-Web, an all-encompassing Solana Profile Page, Ninja-Vision - A State of the Art Solana Blockchain Explorer giving users much-improved functionality and capability, and most importantly, a Ninja ARPG game built on Unity that utilizes cryptocurrency and NFT technology.
